attributes.action: Give private candidates grades awarded by their exam boards this summer 2021
attributes.additional_details:
If private candidates are required to work with a centre, the Centre should be guaranteed & the centre should act merely as an invigilator & conduit.
I want the Government to mandate this fair procedure in law because last years private candidates did not receive assessment or grades at all. This was not right as these grades are vital to the student’s futures. As a Homeschooler studying independently to be assessed for my Maths IGCSE this year, I need to receive fair evidence-based grades.
attributes.background: Private candidates are students studying independently for GCSEs A-levels and other qualifications. I want guaranteed standardised assessment for all Private candidates by their exam boards. This is because they can’t get Teacher Assessed Grades /access fair CAGs from Centres willing to assess them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We understand you're concerned about private candidates having to work with a school, college, or other exam centre, to provide evidence that can inform a centre-assessed grade, but we're not sure what alternative arrangements you'd like the Government to put in place.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
